alert.note: Alert for White Mountains of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 5:06AM PST until March 12 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT SUNDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Wet snow expected above 7000 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 8 inches between 7,000 to 9,500 feet, with locally higher accumulations above 9,500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...White Mountains of Inyo County. * WHEN...From 4 PM PST Thursday to 5 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will start off as a heavy wet snow, before transitioning to rain below 7,000 to 9,000 feet. A mix of rain and snow will be possible between 7,000 to 9,000 feet. This will result in a heavy load of wet snow, which could collapse roofs.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
